summary: Executes a batch of Mockitis disease simulations over a twoâ€‘dimensional grid of parameter values using the TLO framework, generating synthetic parameter sets, configuring model components, running each scenario, and storing configurations and outcomes for testing and analysis.
business_intent: Provides a systematic way to test and validate the Mockitis disease model across varied parameters, supporting developers and researchers in evaluating model behavior, debugging, and generating data for further scientific analysis.
